title: The best songs for skiing and snowboarding
text:
The best songs for skiing and snowboarding Who doesn't love a sing-song while skiing? Credit: Getty Images Helen Coffey 24 February 2017 â€¢ 10:45am 
S kiing and snowboarding provides the perfect opportunity to appreciate the calm, cool and quiet of nature and be at one with the mountains. But it's also bloomin' invigorating and one of the best times to harness the power of song and belt out a tune at the top of your lungs while carving the bejesus out of a piste. 
Thus inspired, we too have rounded up our favourite songs for the slopes: Prince: Kiss 
Keeping the ultimate pop star alive in our memories (and eardrums) is a duty we are happy to take to the slopes. What could be a better homage than warbling out this 1986 corker of a track, immortalised by Julia Roberts singing it in the bathtub in Pretty Woman ? Hey, if it's good enough to impress Richard Gear, it's good enough for us.
